text: Applause () is a 1944 Greek drama film directed by George Tzavellas. == Cast == * Kleon Triantafyllou ( Attik ) - Alfa * Zinet Lakaz - Nora * Dimitris Horn - Stefanos * Alekos Alexandrakis == References == == External links == * Category:1944 drama films Category:Greek films Category:Greek drama films Category:Greek black-and-white films
title: Applause (1944 film)
